mapper.select: SELECT b.boardId, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, b.createDate, b.updateDate, b.viewCount, b.likeCount, b.commentCount, u.nickname FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY b.boardId DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_id, title, content, createDate, likeCount, dislikeCount, viewCount) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 0, 0)
